entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 1:37 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this afternoon. Rain mixed with drizzle beginning this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain with rain early this evening and with ice pellets overnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to a few flurries and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
